title: The French Tycoon's Pregnant Mistress
description: Devastatingly handsome French tycoon Pascal Lévêque has his sights set on Alana Cusack. Her seeming inexperience intrigues him—she used to be married!Alana's marriage was a sham. It left her feeling unattractive and unwanted. Now that Pascal has claimed her as his mistress, he'll teach the innocent Alana how much pleasure can be had in the bedroom….But passion leads to pregnancy, and Pascal vows he'll take Alana in Paris…and to the altar!
author: Abby Green
